## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are completed before requesting review -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guide
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented complex sections of code
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed any debug code and console logs

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README, architecture docs, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if applicable)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on the visionOS simulator
- [ ] I have tested on an actual Vision Pro device (if applicable)

### Performance

- [ ] My changes don't negatively impact app performance
- [ ] I have considered memory usage implications
- [ ] I have verified the app still runs at 90 FPS

### Additional Checks

- [ ] My changes respect user privacy
- [ ] My changes are accessible (VoiceOver, reduced motion, etc.)
- [ ] My changes work in all supported play space sizes
